summary: Project with 'जुमा कलेक्शन' feature and admin panel. User requested admin panel link/button to be added in the hamburger menu.
architectural_notes: Admin panel is accessible via /admin route
known_issues: Admin panel link/button was missing from the UI navigation

new_feature_requests.summary: Add admin panel link/button in the hamburger menu

Add an 'Admin Panel' link/button inside the hamburger (mobile) menu in the Header component, visible only to authenticated admin users — consistent with the existing desktop admin button logic already present in Header.tsx.
